subject: Re: RS Hack 470 & living in SE Florida
author: John M. Carr
full_text:
Thanks Stefan for your advice,
but I use the headset plug to plug into the mixer and that is only 
6". I heard that anything plugged into the headset will be the 
antenna.

As for metal boxes, hmmmmmm, sound like a good idea, but still the 
antenna is what picks up the stations. I did work better without it 
being plugged into a device, but then the mixing wouldn't occur. 
Microphone, Radio into computer or digital recorder.

Is there a device that can be used as a squelcher?

John
